title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The most bizarre tech announced so far at CES 2026
items.description: From an AI panda pet to an anime girl hologram for your desk, here are the wildest products at CES 2026.

items.title: Ring and Watch Duty Team Up to Keep a Closer Eye on Wildfires
items.description: In a move to help alert people to the spread of nearby blazes, Ring is partnering with Watch Duty to let users share their videos on the wildfire trac...

items.title: The Inevitable Rise of the Art TV
items.description: New televisions from Amazon, Hisense, TCL, and others are designed to display fine art and look like a painting when they’re switched off. It’s all th...

items.title: xAI says it raised $20B in Series E funding
items.description: Nvidia is among the many investors, but xAI has not disclosed if these investments come in the form of equity or debt.

items.title: ‘Industry’ Takes on the Age Verification Wars
items.description: In the HBO show’s fourth season, Industry proves to be more prescient than it’s ever been.

items.title: Intel is building a handheld gaming platform including a dedicated chip
items.description: Intel has been building chips designed for gaming PCs for years but the company is now moving into handheld devices too.

items.title: These Luxurious Headphones Are Almost Half Off
items.description: The Bowers & Wilkins Px8 feature premium materials and luxurious sound.

items.title: LMArena lands $1.7B valuation four months after launching its product
items.description: LMArena, which started as a UC Berkeley research project, has raised about $250 million total and become a unicorn in about seven months.

items.title: California lawmaker proposes a four-year ban on AI chatbots in kids’ toys
items.description: “Our children cannot be used as lab rats for Big Tech to experiment on,” Senator Steve Padilla said. He just introduced a bill to ban AI chatbots in t...

items.title: The 57 Best Shows on Disney+, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
items.description: The End of an Era, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, and The Beatles Anthology are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month...
